page.title: 19THE DOG AND PARTRIDGE
page.content: The Dog and Partridge is 250 yrs old.They sell hot food,cold food and snacks during the week but only cold food and snacks on Sunday.The most popualar food they sell is sausages and the most popular drink is Pils lager.They buy their food from Sutton foods.The company that owns the pub is called Ridleys. They sell beers,wines, spirits and soft drinks.Mr and Mrs Foster live in the pub with their two childen.The pub gets mostly passers by for lunch.They get locals and passers by for dinner.The pub has got a garden for the use of customers with a climbing frame for the children.Their busiest time of the year is summer- time. If it is raining there is a childrens room with lots of toys to play with.There is a window in the lobby where people can buy crisps or bottles of drink to take home.
